quote: It is well enough that people of the nation do not understand our banking and monetary system, for if they did, I believe there would be a revolution before tomorrow morning.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The way to make money is to buy when blood is running in the streets.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Under capitalism, man exploits man. Under communism, it's just the opposite.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: In this world nothing can be said to be certain, except death and taxes.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Inflation is taxation without legislation.
author: Milton Friedman

quote: The way to become rich is to put all your eggs in one basket and then watch that basket.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
author: Epictetus

quote: Don't gamble; take all your savings and buy some good stock and hold it till it goes up, then sell it. If it don't go up, don't buy it.
author: Will Rogers

quote: I made my money by selling too soon.
author: Bernard Baruch

quote: I believe that through knowledge and discipline, financial peace is possible for all of us.
author: Dave Ramsey

quote: All money is a matter of belief.
author: Adam Smith

quote: The curious task of economics is to demonstrate to men how little they really know about what they imagine they can design.
author: Friedrich August von Hayek

quote: People who think about art as an investment are pathetic.
author: Walter Annenberg

quote: Our incomes are like our shoes; if too small, they gall and pinch us; but if too large, they cause us to stumble and to trip.
author: John Locke

quote: Derivatives are financial weapons of mass destruction.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: In the absence of the gold standard, there is no way to protect savings from confiscation through inflation. There is no safe store of value.
author: Alan Greenspan

quote: If all the economists were laid end to end, they'd never reach a conclusion.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: One of the funny things about the stock market is that every time one person buys, another sells, and both think they are astute.
author: William Feather

quote: Capital is that part of wealth which is devoted to obtaining further wealth.
author: Alfred Marshall

quote: The only way you will ever permanently take control of your financial life is to dig deep and fix the root problem.
author: Suze Orman

quote: Money is the best rule of commerce.
author: William Petty

quote: You and I come by road or rail, but economists travel on infrastructure.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Money is like manure. You have to spread it around or it smells.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: There can be no rise in the value of labour without a fall of profits.
author: David Ricardo

quote: My mother inspired me to treat others as I would want to be treated regardless of age, race or financial status.
author: Tommy Hilfiger

quote: About the time we can make the ends meet, somebody moves the ends.
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: It is a kind of spiritual snobbery that makes people think they can be happy without money.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Watch your finances like a hawk.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Infinite growth of material consumption in a finite world is an impossibility.
author: E. F. Schumacher

quote: The financial markets generally are unpredictable. So that one has to have different scenarios... The idea that you can actually predict what's going to happen contradicts my way of looking at the market.
author: George Soros

quote: As sure as the spring will follow the winter, prosperity and economic growth will follow recession.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: The avoidance of taxes is the only intellectual pursuit that still carries any reward.
author: John Maynard Keynes

quote: Poverty is unnecessary.
author: Muhammad Yunus

quote: The only way to permanently change the temperature in the room is to reset the thermostat. In the same way, the only way to change your level of financial success 'permanently' is to reset your financial thermostat. But it is your choice whether you choose to change.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: Financial support is one thing, but I always think what becomes really sacrificial is your time.
author: Cliff Richard

quote: We cannot both preach and administer financial matters.
author: Saint Stephen

quote: Stay on top of your finances. Don't leave that up to others.
author: Leif Garrett

quote: We teach about how to drive in school, but not how to manage finances.
author: Andy Williams

quote: The lesson of history is that you do not get a sustained economic recovery as long as the financial system is in crisis.
author: Ben Bernanke

quote: The longer I go on, the more I am aware of the power of finance.
author: Justin Welby

quote: Being rich is a good thing. Not just in the obvious sense of benefitting you and your family, but in the broader sense. Profits are not a zero sum game. The more you make, the more of a financial impact you can have.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: I wasn't a financial pro, and I paid the price.
author: Ruth Handler

quote: I'm involved in the stock market, which is fun and, sometimes, very painful.
author: Regis Philbin

quote: The economy is a very sensitive organism.
author: Hjalmar Schacht

quote: There's more honor in investment management than in investment banking.
author: Charlie Munger

quote: We need real campaign finance reform to loosen the grip of special interests on politics.
author: Tom Daschle

quote: Divorce is one of the most financially traumatic things you can go through. Money spent on getting mad or getting even is money wasted.
author: Richard Wagner

quote: The poor don't know that their function in life is to exercise our generosity.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: The job of the Central Bank is to worry.
author: Alice Rivlin

quote: A big part of financial freedom is having your heart and mind free from worry about the what-ifs of life.
author: Suze Orman

quote: Financial literacy is an issue that should command our attention because many Americans are not adequately organizing finances for their education, healthcare and retirement.
author: Ron Lewis

quote: Well, I think that there's a very thin dividing line between success and failure. And I think if you start a business without financial backing, you're likely to go the wrong side of that dividing line.
author: Richard Branson

quote: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I finally know what distinguishes man from the other beasts: financial worries.
author: Jules Renard

quote: We've taken the view that if the rest of the world would democratize and create market economies, that would spread the benefits of prosperity around the world, and that it would enhance our own prosperity, and our own stability and security, as well.
author: Jeffrey Sachs

quote: Show people tend to treat their finances like their dentistry. They assume the man handling it knows what he is doing.
author: Dick Cavett

quote: Financial crises are like fireworks: they illuminate the sky even as they go pop.
author: James Buchan

quote: These heroes of finance are like beads on a string; when one slips off, all the rest follow.
author: Henrik Ibsen

quote: I'm a big advocate of financial intelligence.
author: Daymond John

quote: My adversary is the world of finance.
author: Francois Hollande
